cause.description:
Chabad at UW is a place for every Jewish Husky to hang out, learn about Judaism in a relaxed environment, with no pressure, make Jewish friends, question anything and everything, grab an awesome home-cooked meal, Shabbat dinners, and so much more!
1. We believe in Judaism.
2. We believe in Jews.
3. We believe that Jews on campus should have a place they can call their own.
cause.mission: Provide a home for every Jewish Husky!
cause.name: Chabad at University of Washington
